Package fr.umlv.square.client

Class Worker

java.lang.Object
fr.umlv.square.client.Worker
public class Worker
extends java.lang.Object
Worker class is a class use to manage application start, log reading and log sending to Square API for persistence

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Worker()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void checkAppAlive()
    Update the boolean appIsALive according to the result of a ps command.
    void doWork()
    Sends logs of the application running to the endpoint API of square
    boolean startApp()
    Start the app app.jar in the container

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Worker

      public Worker()

  • Method Details

    • startApp

      public boolean startApp()
      Start the app app.jar in the container
      Returns:
      true if the app has started correctly and false otherwise

    • doWork

      public void doWork() throws java.io.IOException
      Sends logs of the application running to the endpoint API of square
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • checkAppAlive

      public void checkAppAlive()
      Update the boolean appIsALive according to the result of a ps command. If the app has been found in the ps, the app is alive, otherwise it's dead
